name: lingcod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large fish that is found in the Pacific Ocean near North America, or the meat of this fish: Lingcod are included in the fishing restrictions. I make this recipe with thick pieces of ling cod.
More examplesFewer examplesLingcod is the perfect fish for this recipe, but you can also use sea bass or haddock.Lingcod is one of the species being overfished.He said that halibut and lingcod could be grown on fish farms.
